title: Odinfall
description:
Try, die and try again!
Level up, amass firepower & hone your skills to fight your way through the post- apocalyptic Viking future and take down Odin!
Punch gods in the face with your robot arm as the Cyberserker . Slice your way through mobs with the Dark Elf. Stampede your foes as a Viking Moose. Mine gold to upgrade your gear as the Dwarf , or dual wield minigunstwice your size as the manic Gnome .
BUILD YOUR OWN FIREPOWER

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 Ti or AMD HD 7850
